name: Ring Swing
description:
Prepare your reflexes, concentrate and accept the challenge of playing Ring Swing, a game where you will have to show your skills by going through rings at high speeds trying not to crash, get as many points as you can and get as far as possible, unlock different customizations for your character and have fun.

Ring Swing is very simple, just customize your character to your liking and when you start just touch any part of the screen to move your character and go through the rings.
